column4: Why can't I remove resolv.conf as root? I get operation not permitted error.
Maybe it's in use. I don't know what it does but I think it's important.
I know it's important but I'm trying to install packages to fix some networking issues and they aren't able to install because of it.
It's just a little bit of a pain to set up restricted formats but it's only a matter of getting a program or two from the package manager.
